content: **knitted jumper for dogs in 2 strands drops fabel the piece is worked in rib sizes xs - m ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-499 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m examples of breeds xs = chihuahua s = bichon frisé m = cocker spaniel dog s measurements chest approx 28/32 - 38/42 - 48/52 cm length along back approx 25-34-43 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 114 light pearl grey 50-50-50 g colour 923 country fair needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
